cardDetail.title: Caprese Salad
cardDetail.description: A delightful combination of ripe tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and basil, drizzled with balsamic glaze for a fresh and vibrant starter.

cardDetail.title: Garlic Bread
cardDetail.description: Crispy slices of bread coated with garlic butter and herbs, baked to golden perfection and served warm.

cardDetail.title: Chocolate Lava Cake
cardDetail.description: An indulgent dessert with a gooey molten chocolate center, served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

cardDetail.title: Caesar Salad
cardDetail.description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with creamy Caesar dressing, Parmesan cheese, and crunchy croutons.

cardDetail.title: Stuffed Mushrooms
cardDetail.description: Mushrooms filled with a savory blend of cheese, herbs, and breadcrumbs, baked until golden and delicious.

cardDetail.title: Tiramisu
cardDetail.description: A classic Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cream, and a dusting of cocoa powder.

cardDetail.title: Garden Fresh Pizza
cardDetail.description: A thin-crust pizza topped with a medley of fresh vegetables, mozzarella, and a zesty tomato sauce.

cardDetail.title: Spinach Artichoke Dip
cardDetail.description: A creamy and cheesy dip with spinach and artichokes, served with crispy pita chips.

cardDetail.title: Berry Cheesecake
cardDetail.description: A rich and creamy cheesecake topped with a mix of fresh berries and a hint of mint.

testimonailsData.name: Antony Clifton
testimonailsData.review: The cozy ambiance at Little Lemon Restaurant perfectly complements their delicious, zesty dishes. A delightful spot for fresh flavors and warm hospitality!
